{{cpp/title|tuple_size&lt;small&gt;&lt;std::experimental::ranges::tagged&gt;&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/tagged/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=ranges| 
template&lt; class Base, class... Tags &gt;
struct tuple_size&lt;std::experimental::ranges::tagged&lt;Base, Tags...&gt;&gt;
    : std::tuple_size&lt;Base&gt; {};
}}

The partial specialization of {{c|std::tuple_size}} for {{tt|tagged}} provides the ability to obtain the number of elements in a {{tt|tagged}} object using tuple-like syntax. It simply forwards to {{c|std::tuple_size&lt;Base&gt;}}.

{{cpp/types/integral_constant/inherit2|{{c|std::tuple_size&lt;Base&gt;::value}}|std::size_t}}
